message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the purchase of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for us to work together. I'm willing to offer you the product at a price of $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit too pricey. I'm willing to pay $900000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1050000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value of the product to you.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $1050000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $975000. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me.

I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product to you, and I'm willing to meet you halfway again.
